xs:annotation.xs:documentation: What is the maximal amount of productions per page?
The API URL for the next page (or empty string for the last page)
The API URL for the previous page (or empty string for the first page)
How many productions are there in total?
Unique production ID on your website
Production creation timestamp in ISO 8601 format
Production modification timestamp in ISO 8601 format
A link to the your website page about this production in German
A link to the your website page about this production in English
